title: Champion Update: Ryze, the Rune Mage

replies.body: feel like there are plenty more champions that have been untouched for a long while could do with a rework before ryze gets his second...
Second rework? It's like his third or fourth rework, meanwhile Yorick rework has been delayed...

Evidently, the Yorick rework is something that is taking a lot more effort on Riot's behalf. Yorick has a very unique kit in that he is the only champion who summons a creature with every single one of his abilities. On the other hand, for Ryze they really only changed 2 of his abilities and they arent particular complex. They couldve quite easily just not done this rework and still wouldve had to postpone yorick. But they decided to release this change and i think it is kinda cool
BUWHYYY RITO! BUT I LOVE YORICK!
this is ryzes 4th rework

I am also excited for this update coming any time soon. Really looking forward to that for a while.

**https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4Iu8m1GvFY8**



I have a feeling Ryze could become a bit too strong with this overhaul

"We want clarity in his kit"
"you know what would be cool"
"yeah?" 
"BLUE SHIT EVERYWHERE WITH RUNE E AND Q."
"YO."

In the description of his new R, "Cannot be self cast, because teleporting **to your own location** would be silly."  That little addition makes it sound more like you're teleporting people TO you, rather than yourself and nearby friends somewhere else.

Might be clearer just to say that it has a "minimum cast range" (even if that minimum is the diameter of the area).

Also, you guys might want to change "Root" to "snare" for ability descriptions on OCE... considering what "root" is slang for down here (it's not exactly "kid friendly")...
Well firstly, kids don't know what the slang term means and secondly, root still means the same thing down here, we don't think Ryze will... well... the context makes it clear.
You won't be saying that when he teleports behind you.
Ryze now no longer looks like sideshow bob with feet halfway to africa, I'm am impressed!
As am I, but is Zombie Ryze even a zombie anymore?
sick

you have destroyed my memories of ryze, you should have just deleted him and made a new character because that's what u pretty much did but keped the character model and name

all i cansay is wow. why? Why do this to such a beautifully simple straight forward champion. Why so many tele ports theres no reason for it. you are literally ruining this game slowly. Please stop this. It makes me sad on the inside and makes me not want to play league anymore. as the games been changing I know a lot of people who have stopped playing because of all of the bad changes being made to league. When is Riot gonna rework my dawg Nasus?

I don't think he needs a rework; he's in a really decent spot right now. He has obvious strengths, clear weaknesses, power spikes and dips during the game, and has a fairly flexible itemisation meta.

Why do you think Nasus needs reworking?
